content: Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hassle-free – minimized jamming and lost screws due to the optimized strip feed system Much faster than single screws – for higher productivity and less interruption due to re-loading Designed to be easy to use, reliable and convenient Quick transition from collated to single screws with a simple click – no tools needed Magazine can be removed and cleaned easily Applications Repetitive fastening of drywall boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 51 mm Repetitive fastening of wood boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 51 mm Repetitive fastening of exterior sheathing boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 51 mm Compatible with Driver bit S-SY PH2 102/4 (5) #2131008 and Driver bit S-SY PH2 102/4 (10) #2131009 ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 7.6 in Magazine capacity: 40 Screw length - min: 0.98 in Technical Data | Length | 7.6 in | Magazine capacity | 40 | Screw length - min | 0.98 in | Screw length - max | 2.01 in | Weight | 0.6 lb ### ITEMS- 2208485 - Screw Magazine SD-M 2 02 - Package Size 1 pc
